successes.title: E1 Camera. 4K UHD interchangeable lens camera
successes.description: 4K UHD. Smallest form factor camera. Supports all Panasonic/Olympus MFT lenses and incredible low light performance. $699.00 MSRP.

Pledges.description: You love us, you want to help - a huge THANK YOU!
You really want to see this become a reality, but are holding off on an early bird special. THANK YOU!

The EARLY BIRD Special: one of the first 400 units of  E1 Camera. 
 4096x2160p@24fps |  3840x2160p@30fps | 1920x1080HD@60fps  |  1920x1080HD@30fps  ISO 102400 max for video.
Body weight only 210g with battery
Interchangeable MFT lens mount
WIFI & BLUETOOTH 4.0 ENABLED
